response: Welcome to our module on scooter ownership made easy. Discover convenient features like home service and seamless home charging with a portable charger. Enjoy the benefits of our expanding hypercharger network, offering super-fast charging and up to 50 kilometers range in just 15 minutes. All our customers can use this network for free for a limited period. Book services easily from our app and benefit from predictive AI maintenance and 24/7 roadside assistance. Save more with lower running costs, up to 50% less total cost of ownership, and immunity to rising fuel costs. Learn how these features make owning and maintaining your scooter easier. Thank you.
title: L1.1.4 Ownership made easy.mp4
